article_title: When You Care for Someone With Alzheimer’s
article_text:
The past year has been one of grieving and loss for Tony Iero, whose longtime partner, Paul Myers, passed away in May of Alzheimer’s-related pneumonia, his body failing him years after his mind. His ashes are enclosed in a box on a bookshelf in Mr. Iero’s Philadelphia home.

Bill Clinton’s wife, Dorothy, has further succumbed to the disease to the point where she can no longer walk. She is confined to a wheelchair in the family room...

twitter.description: Three caregivers who were profiled by The Wall Street Journal a year ago discuss how their and their loved ones’ lives have changed.

article_summary:
Bill Clinton’s wife, Dorothy, has further succumbed to the disease to the point where she can no longer walk.
She is confined to a wheelchair in the family room...
His ashes are enclosed in a box on a bookshelf in Mr. Iero’s Philadelphia home.
The past year has been one of grieving and loss for Tony Iero, whose longtime partner, Paul Myers, passed away in May of Alzheimer’s-related pneumonia, his body failing him years after his mind.
